writings.text: 目は口ほどに物を言う

readings.text: めはくちほどにものをいう

furigana.writing: 目は口ほどに物を言う
furigana.reading: めはくちほどにものをいう
めはくちほどにものをいう

glossary: eyes are as eloquent as the tongue
one can say more with a look than with ten thousand words
the eyes are the windows to the soul
the eyes cannot belie one's true thoughts
